AntzGlyph¶

increment_ids¶

Iterates over each NodeFileRow in the glyph and updates its ID, parent ID, and child ID reflect as a new glyph in a node file starting with the highest ID + 1. This is called automatically when adding glyph to NodeFile

i.e. a glyph with such as

id | parent_id | child_id
1–| 0———–| 0
2–| 1———–| 0
3–| 1———–| 2

will become

id | parent_id | child_id
4–| 0———–| 0
5–| 4———–| 0
6–| 4———–| 5

Parameters:

Name

Description

Type

Default

match_data_and_record_id_to_id

Should the rows update their record ID and data to match their ID?

bool

True

Returns: None

Example:

from matritools import nodefile as nf

my_glyph = nf.AntzGlyph("example.csv")

# Iterate over each NodeFileRow in the glyph and matches its record id and data to its id
my_glyph.increment_ids()
